amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part E of House Report 117-464: Nos. 1 and 3.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 1 and 3, printed in Part E of House Report 117-464.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Danny K. amendments (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 211 (Roll no. 433).
